generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks and lane markings, which is clearly designated for vehicle travel.
- sidewalk: There are pedestrian walkways on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and vegetation.
- building: Multiple residential and commercial buildings line both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and shrubs are visible along the sidewalks and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- car: Several cars are parked along the right side of the road, and at least one car is visible on the left side.
- pole: Utility poles are visible along the street, supporting overhead wires.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- train: The presence of tram tracks in the road indicates a train (specifically a tram) system is present.
